instructions: Start by downloading Spotify from Apple s App Store . If you already have a Spotify account, sign in. If not, you can register for an account to get started. While the Spotify app has an icon for Spotify Premium on the bottom menu to the far right, this only provides more information about the service, but not a way to subscribe. Using your phone's mobile browser, go to Spotify.com/premium , then tap Get Premium . Log in with your Spotify username and password. Enter your credit/debit card information or PayPal information. Tap Start My Spotify Premium to complete the purchase. Return to the Spotify app and start listening.
